statements: SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, delivery_service FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE delivery_service = 'Express'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, delivery_service FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id, amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, customer_id, delivery_service FROM transactions WHERE customer_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM transactions WHERE delivery_service_id = 2;
SELECT revenue_amount, revenue_date FROM revenue_streams WHERE revenue_stream_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_service_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM transactions GROUP BY delivery_service_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT revenue_amount, revenue_date FROM revenue_streams WHERE revenue_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY revenue_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM transactions WHERE payment_amount < 500 AND delivery_service_id = 2
SELECT transaction_date, payment_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM revenue_streams WHERE revenue_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE delivery_provider = 'DHL';
SELECT user_name, email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT transaction_id, revenue_amount FROM revenue WHERE revenue_amount < 500 ORDER BY revenue_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, provider_rating FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_rating DESC;
SELECT income_amount, income_date FROM revenue_streams WHERE service_provider_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, provider_rating FROM service_providers WHERE provider_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM revenue_streams WHERE income_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY income_date ASC;
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.transaction_amount, customers.customer_name FROM transactions INNER JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT timestamp, amount, revenue_type FROM revenue_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT service_name, service_type, delivery_location FROM delivery_service_info LIMIT 3;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_status FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT rd.revenue_type, COUNT(*) AS total_revenue_count FROM revenue_data rd JOIN transaction_data td ON rd.transaction_id = td.transaction_id GROUP BY rd.revenue_type ORDER BY total_revenue_count DESC;

SELECT td.transaction_id, ts.transaction_status, dsi.service_name FROM transaction_data td JOIN transaction_history ts ON td.transaction_id = ts.transaction_id JOIN delivery_service_info dsi ON ts.delivery_service_id = dsi.service_id WHERE dsi.rating > 4;

SELECT cd.name, cd.email, rd.amount AS revenue_amount FROM customer_data cd JOIN transaction_data td ON cd.customer_id = td.customer_id JOIN revenue_data rd ON td.transaction_id = rd.transaction_id WHERE rd.timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rd.amount DESC;
